name: UpdateEventOrchestrationGlobalRules
description:
Update global orchestration rules for event orchestration.

This tool updates the Global Orchestration Rules for an Event Orchestration in PagerDuty. It is used to modify and enhance events by evaluating them against a set of global rules and potentially routing them for further processing. Use this tool when you need to adjust the rules governing all events within a specific orchestration.

parameters.name: event_orchestration_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for an Event Orchestration to update its global rules.

value_schema.description: The ID of an Event Orchestration.

parameters.name: versioning_header
parameters.description: The versioning header to specify the API version. It should be a string representing the desired API version.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the request body. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: update_global_orchestration_rules
parameters.description: Provide a JSON object containing the updates to Global Orchestration rules. Any rules or rule details not included in this object will be deleted.

value_schema.description: Update Global Orchestration rules. Omitted rules and rule details are deleted.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of an Event Orchestration.

value_schema.description: The ID of an Event Orchestration.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: Update Global Orchestration rules. Omitted rules and rule details are deleted.

value_schema.description: Update Global Orchestration rules. Omitted rules and rule details are deleted.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
